name: Jim Meehan's Fresa Verde
description: Muddled bell pepper and strawberry make this creation from Jim Meehan of PDT more than your average pomegranate margarita.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce lime juice from 1 to 2 limes

recipeInstructions.text: Add strawberries, bell pepper, and pomegranate molasses to a shaker and muddle until strawberry is broken down.
Add tequila and lime juice, then fill shaker 2/3 full with ice and shake vigorously until the outside of the shaker begins to frost.
Double strain into a chilled cocktail glass, garnish with extra strawberry slice and serve.
